name: Nanobot Wars
description:
“Nanobot Wars”  is a strategy game where you simulate battles between two enemy swarms of nanobots. You choose the characteristics of your creation and then you let them fight in an arena to see which is the deadliest bot.

You can set up your part of the battlefield before the round starts, adding walls, energy or danger-zones for the robots. But be careful! You will affect both your and your enemy robots! So use these tools carefully!
